L

Loan - Class in account
The Loan class represents a customer's loan information and operations related to loans It is linked to the account class and has methods to apply for new loans, perform and track Loan payments.
Loan(double, float, int, int) - Constructor for class account.Loan
Constructs a new Loan object with the specified details.

P

printAmortizationSchedule() - Method in class account.Loan
Prints amortization schedule of the Loan.

R

readLoansFromCSV(int) - Static method in class account.Loan
Reads list of Loans from CSV file and returns a Loan object that matches the specified accountID and have the "Approved" status.
rejectLoan() - Method in class account.Loan
Rejects the Loan and updates the status of the Loan from "Pending" to "Rejected".
repay(double) - Method in class account.Loan
Repays the monthly payment of the Loan, updating the Account Balance after deduction.
